mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, P.pno, P.pregdate, P.pname, P.pdetail, P.uno, U.uname, L.ltitle, L.lbgcolor FROM Project P LEFT JOIN Label L ON P.lno = L.lno LEFT JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno LEFT JOIN ProjectMemberStat S ON S.pno = P.pno GROUP BY P.pno ORDER BY pno DESC LIMIT #{pageNo}, #{rowsPerPage}
SELECT pno, pname, pdetail, pdata, pregdate, pduedate, P.uno, U.uname, L.ltitle, L.lbgcolor FROM Project P LEFT JOIN Label L ON P.lno = L.lno LEFT JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno WHERE pno=#{pno}
mapper.update: UPDATE Project SET pname = #{pname}, pdetail = #{pdetail}, pdata=#{pdata}, pregdate=curdate(), pduedate=#{pduedate} WHERE pno = #{pno}
mapper.select: SELECT uno, uname, uphoneno, udepartment, uemail FROM User
SELECT pno, p.uno, stat, uname FROM ProjectMemberStat p JOIN User u ON p.uno = u.uno WHERE pno = #{pno}
select CODE_TYPE, CODE, CODE_NAME from CodeTable where CODE_TYPE=#{CODE_TYPE}
select uno, uname, uphoneno, udepartment, uemail from User where uname like '%' #{uname} '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Milestones WHERE pno=#{pno} AND mstatement=001
